ares_trophy_2.context:
"Thailand ICT Award 2013"

- New Media and Entertainment Category, 2013

ares_weapon_blaster.context: Snipe Mode: Single-shot energy pistol. Combat Mode: Fire short-distance energy blast.

ares_weapon_wave.context: Snipe Mode: Emits an anti-synthetic shockwave. Combat Mode: Emit magnifying shockwave.

ares_weapon_laser.context: Snipe Mode: Fully-automatic firearm. Combat Mode: Generate an intense laser blade.

ares_weapon_proton.context: Snipe Mode: Launches a compressed photon ball which explodes on impact. Combat Mode: Throw a clingy photon ball which damage all enemies near its path.

ares_character_ares.context: Earth's first advance combat robot. Specialize in long-range combat.

ares_character_tarus.context: Heavy tanker who crush through anything that come close.

pandoria_trophy_1.context:
"Game of the Year"

- Thai Game Award, 2019

pandoria_trophy_3.context:
"Best Indie Game"

- Google Play Best of Awards, 2019

pandoria_trophy_5.context:
"Best of Visual Art"

- Thai Game Award, 2019

pandoria_character_alyna.context: The young female warrior. Board Skill: Provoke, force the enemy target to battle. Battle Skill: Impale, attacks and inflicts the opponent with MOV -1.

pandoria_character_gus.context: The nimble thief. Board Skill: Lucky Bolt, attacks and steals 1 mana from the enemy target. Battle Skill: Snatch, attacks and steals a random item from the opponent.

pandoria_character_kyro.context: The sorcerer's apprentice. Board Skill: Arcane Barricade, creates a wall that damage and stop any passing player. Battle Skill: Magic Missile, attacks the opponent thrice.

pandoria_character_hedgie.context: An adorable fluffy little monster dwells in the Mystical Forest.

pandoria_character_mimic_1.context: A mysterious cat-like creature with mythical powers.

pandoria_character_mimic_2.context: A mythical cat-like creature with mysterious powers.

pandoria_character_mimic_3.context: A mysterious mythical creature with cat powers.

pandoria_box.context: A mysterious chest which contain an Artifact.

pandoria_cosmetic_coffin.context:
A perfect comfy bed for vampire kin.

Can be found in Halloween Bag.

pandoria_cosmetic_cat_head.context:
A little kitty cat nestled comfortably on top of your head.

Can be found in Lucky Bag.

pandoria_cosmetic_buffalo.context:
A miniature replica of the Buffalo Amulet. Believed to give you strength that can ward off ghost and thief.

Can be found in Thai Ghost Bag.

pandoria_cosmetic_angel_ring.context:
A true testimonial for qualified angel.

Only obtainable through limited time event.

pandoria_cosmetic_butterfly_mask.context: It's a mask that looks like a butterfly. Contrary to the popular believe, it's not made from an actual butterfly.

pandoria_cosmetic_turtle_shell.context:
A sturdy shell that was once a safe home for a turtle. It now lives in a sewer.

Can be bought from the shop.

pandoria_cosmetic_namthow.context:
Just a whiff can knocked out even the best of drinkers. Please drink responsibly.

Can be found in Lucky Bag.

pandoria_cosmetic_buckler.context:
A round shield that was supposed to be worn on the forearm, but it was too big to handle.

Can be bought from the shop.

pandoria_cosmetic_big_sword.context:
For big boys only.

Only obtainable through pre-registration.

pandoria_cosmetic_ancient_roll.context:
A part of a lost ancient technology. It is still functioning even after thousand of years.

Only obtainable through monthly rewards.

pandoria_cosmetic_hero_mask.context:
Those who donned this mask shall receive a fruitful regeneration.

Only obtainable through monthly rewards.

pandoria_cosmetic_dragon_eggs.context:
Fetched from the trip to the cosmos that bend space and time.

Can be found in Cosmos Bag.

pandoria_cosmetic_pumpkin_candy.context:
Fueled from the Halloween spirits and sugar rush.

Can be found in Halloween Bag.

pandoria_cosmetic_banana_basket.context:
Be careful, as carrying this can result in a troop of monkeys chasing you.

Can be found in Fruit Bag.

pandoria_cosmetic_big_water_gun.context:
Quench the heat and splash your friends at the same time.

Only obtainable through limited time event.

pandoria_character_filo_sturdy_me.context: Just let me sleep in peace, man.

pandoria_character_dexter_jr.context: Please do not enter my laboratory!
